helpers Package¶

censor Module¶

helpers.censor.badwords(db, text)[source]¶

Checks if the given text contains any “kill” or “warning” words. Returns 2 on kill words, 1 on warning words, otherwise 0.

helpers.censor.has_words(text, words_list)[source]¶

Returns True if the given text contains and words in the given word list, otherwise returns False.
